channel.title: Contributors on Automated API and Unit testing Docs for OpenFOAM libs
channel.description: Recent content in Contributors on Automated API and Unit testing Docs for OpenFOAM libs

item.title: <Missing>
item.description: This means the documentation software could not infer the contributor from the header and source files. This is fine for external libraries (e.g. OpenFOAM functions) but we shouldn’t have many of our own entities here! Comment your classes and functions with the following to assign two contributors: /// @output-section author:elwardi class Test; Otherwise please use git to fetch commit authors for the file: git shortlog -n -s -- path/to/file Here is a full list of all code entities which have no contributor assigned:

item.title: <Optional>
item.description: This means the documentation software could not infer the contributor from the header and source files. This is not fine as we strive to document everything. Comment your classes and functions with the following to assign a contributor: /// @output-section author:elwardi class Test; Otherwise please use git to fetch commit authors for the file and blame for the specific set of lines: git shortlog -n -s -- path/to/file

item.title: Mohammed Elwardi Fadeli
item.description: Main developer of this toolkit: A CFD enthusiast with passion for software development.
